title: The Battle for France
description: In the six weeks from 10 May 1940, German forces defeated Allied forces by mobile operations and conquered France, Belgium, Luxembourg and the Netherlands, bringing land operations on the Western Front to an end until 6 June 1944. Italy entered the war on 10 June 1940 and invaded France over the Alps.

title: The Battle of Britain
description: A documentary look at the Battle of Britain, the leaders and the units involved, the events leading to the battle and the key factors in determining the outcome.

title: The Battle of Midway
description: A documentary look at the WWII battle of midway. The events leading up to the battle, the national and war leaders involved, and the critical events that lead to the outcome.

title: The Battle of the Atlantic
description: An analysis of the Battle for the Atlantic from September 1939 through the end of the war. Primarily a tale of the war against the U-Boats, background of Germany's experience during WWI, the Happy Time, the closing of the Atlantic Air Gap and the ultimate death toll .

title: The Battle for the Rhine
description: A documentary look at the Battle for the Rhine and the events leading up to it. Profiles of national and military leaders, the units involved, and the events leading to the eventual outcome.

The Showdown in the Iron Triangle
